project: Book RipCage for Your Next Event!
descriptionTitle: RipCage is ready to bring their electrifying heavy metal and hardcore sound to the stage.
description: With the release of our debut album, When the World Burns, we are more eager than ever to perform live. We are passionate about delivering high-energy performances that resonate with our influences from Metallica, Pantera, Slayer, Madball, and Sick of it All.
description2: Whether it's a festival, club show, or private event, RipCage is prepared to bring heavy riffs, powerful grooves, and unforgettable melodies to your audience. Don't miss the chance to experience our music live!
description3: Contact us now to book RipCage for your next gig and be a part of the metal revolution.

descriptionTitle: Embark on a sonic voyage with RipCage's debut album, 'When the World Burns''
description: â€“ a potent blend of heavy metal that delivers a visceral impact to your senses.
description2: Prepare for a high-octane journey that captures the unfiltered essence of RipCage's musical prowess.
